God<S>2316</S>, who at sundry times<S>4181</S> and<S>2532</S> in divers manners<S>4187</S> spake<S>2980</S> in time past<S>3819</S> unto the fathers<S>3962</S> by<S>1722</S> the prophets<S>4396</S>,
Hath<S>2980</S> in<S>1909</S> these<S>5130</S> last<S>2078</S> days<S>2250</S> spoken<S>2980</S> unto us<S>2254</S> by<S>1722</S> his Son<S>5207</S>, whom<S>3739</S> he hath appointed<S>5087</S> heir<S>2818</S> of all things<S>3956</S>, by<S>1223</S> whom<S>3739</S> also<S>2532</S> he made<S>4160</S> the worlds<S>165</S>;
Who<S>3739</S> being<S>5607</S> the brightness<S>541</S> of his glory<S>1391</S>, and<S>2532</S> the express image<S>5481</S> of his<S>846</S> person<S>5287</S>, and<S>5037</S> upholding<S>5342</S> all things<S>3956</S> by the word<S>4487</S> of his<S>846</S> power<S>1411</S>, when he had<S>4160</S> <S>2512</S> by<S>1223</S> himself<S>1438</S> purged<S>4160</S> <S>2512</S> our<S>2257</S> sins<S>266</S>, sat down<S>2523</S> on<S>1722</S> the right hand<S>1188</S> of the Majesty<S>3172</S> on<S>1722</S> high<S>5308</S>;
Being made<S>1096</S> so much<S>5118</S> better than<S>2909</S> the angels<S>32</S>, as<S>3745</S> he hath by inheritance obtained<S>2816</S> a more excellent<S>1313</S> name<S>3686</S> than<S>3844</S> they<S>846</S>.
For<S>1063</S> unto which<S>5101</S> of the angels<S>32</S> said he<S>2036</S> at any time<S>4218</S>, Thou<S>4771</S> art<S>1488</S> my<S>3450</S> Son<S>5207</S>, this day<S>4594</S> have<S>1080</S> I<S>1473</S> begotten<S>1080</S> thee<S>4571</S>? And<S>2532</S> again<S>3825</S>, I<S>1473</S> will be<S>2071</S> to<S>1519</S> him<S>846</S> a Father<S>3962</S>, and<S>2532</S> he<S>846</S> shall be<S>2071</S> to<S>1519</S> me<S>3427</S> a Son<S>5207</S>?
And<S>1161</S> again<S>3825</S>, when<S>3752</S> he bringeth in<S>1521</S> the firstbegotten<S>4416</S> into<S>1519</S> the world<S>3625</S>, he saith<S>3004</S>, And<S>2532</S> let<S>4352</S> all<S>3956</S> the angels<S>32</S> of God<S>2316</S> worship<S>4352</S> him<S>846</S>. <sup>again: or, when he bringeth again</sup>
And<S>2532</S> of<S>4314</S> <S>3303</S> the angels<S>32</S> he saith<S>3004</S>, Who maketh<S>4160</S> his<S>846</S> angels<S>32</S> spirits<S>4151</S>, and<S>2532</S> his<S>846</S> ministers<S>3011</S> a flame<S>5395</S> of fire<S>4442</S>. <sup>And of: Gr. And unto</sup>
But<S>1161</S> unto<S>4314</S> the Son<S>5207</S> he saith, Thy<S>4675</S> throne<S>2362</S>, O God<S>2316</S>, is for<S>1519</S> ever<S>165</S> and ever<S>165</S>: a sceptre<S>4464</S> of righteousness<S>2118</S> is the sceptre<S>4464</S> of thy<S>4675</S> kingdom<S>932</S>. <sup>righteousness: Gr. rightness, or, straightness</sup>
Thou hast loved<S>25</S> righteousness<S>1343</S>, and<S>2532</S> hated<S>3404</S> iniquity<S>458</S>; therefore<S>1223</S> <S>5124</S> God<S>2316</S>, even thy<S>4675</S> God<S>2316</S>, hath anointed<S>5548</S> thee<S>4571</S> with the oil<S>1637</S> of gladness<S>20</S> above<S>3844</S> thy<S>4675</S> fellows<S>3353</S>.
And<S>2532</S>, Thou<S>4771</S>, Lord<S>2962</S>, in<S>2596</S> the beginning<S>746</S> hast laid the foundation<S>2311</S> of the earth<S>1093</S>; and<S>2532</S> the heavens<S>3772</S> are<S>1526</S> the works<S>2041</S> of thine<S>4675</S> hands<S>5495</S>:
They<S>846</S> shall perish<S>622</S>; but<S>1161</S> thou<S>4771</S> remainest<S>1265</S>; and<S>2532</S> they all<S>3956</S> shall wax old<S>3822</S> as<S>5613</S> doth a garment<S>2440</S>;
And<S>2532</S> as<S>5616</S> a vesture<S>4018</S> shalt thou fold<S>1667</S> them<S>846</S> up<S>1667</S>, and<S>2532</S> they shall be changed<S>236</S>: but<S>1161</S> thou<S>4771</S> art<S>1488</S> the same<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> thy<S>4675</S> years<S>2094</S> shall<S>1587</S> not<S>3756</S> fail<S>1587</S>.
But<S>1161</S> to<S>4314</S> which<S>5101</S> of the angels<S>32</S> said he<S>2046</S> at any time<S>4218</S>, Sit<S>2521</S> on<S>1537</S> my<S>3450</S> right hand<S>1188</S>, until<S>302</S> <S>2193</S> I make<S>5087</S> thine<S>4675</S> enemies<S>2190</S> thy<S>4675</S> footstool<S>5286</S> <S>4228</S>?
Are they<S>1526</S> not<S>3780</S> all<S>3956</S> ministering<S>3010</S> spirits<S>4151</S>, sent forth<S>649</S> to<S>1519</S> minister<S>1248</S> for<S>1223</S> them who shall<S>3195</S> be heirs of<S>2816</S> salvation<S>4991</S>?
